sections.purpose: To safely contain and ventilate hazardous vapors, dusts, and aerosols generated during extraction and chemical handling.
sections.scope: Applicable to volatile solvent extractions and toxic plant material processing in Pharmacognosy.
procedure: Turn ON the fume hood sash to the appropriate working height (usually sash sash sash at elbow level).
Verify airflow indicator is green and airflow is adequate.
Place equipment and chemicals at least 6 inches inside the hood.
Work with arms inside the hood and minimize rapid movements.
After work, clean surfaces and allow hood to run for 5 minutes before closing sash.
Report any airflow alarms or unusual odors immediately.
precautions: Do not block hood vents or airflow.
Never work with back to the interior.
Use secondary containment for volatile liquids.
Wear appropriate PPE even in the fume hood.
